description: Derived from the popularity of the term 'Girl Power' (Joshiryoku in Japanese), this is the male version. Refers to a man who is very masculine and ideal boyfriend material.

examples.chinese: 你的老公满满的男友力
examples.translation: Your husband is full of boyfriend power.

examples.chinese: 他太苏了吧,男友力爆棚
examples.translation: He's so charming, his boyfriend power is exploding.

examples.chinese: 一间亲手完成的DIY地下室,尊嘟男友力MAX!
examples.translation: A DIY basement finished by hand, seriously max boyfriend power!
